q: The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.
h:
“The quality of your life is the quality of your relationships.” —
Tony Robbins

q: All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers.
h:
“All men who have achieved great things have been great dreamers. ” —
Orison Swett Marden

q: Imagination is the beginning of creation.
h:
“Imagination is the beginning of creation.” —
George Bernard Shaw

q: When it hurts - observe. Life is trying to teach you something.
h:
“When it hurts - observe. Life is trying to teach you something.” —
Anita Krizzan

q: All human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes.
h:
“All human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: If someone betrays you once, it's their fault; if they betray you twice, it's your fault.
h:
“If someone betrays you once, it's their fault; if they betray you twice, it's your fault.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

q: I can think of nothing less pleasurable than a life devoted to pleasure.
h:
“I can think of nothing less pleasurable than a life devoted to pleasure.” —
John D. Rockefeller

q: The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.
h:
“The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: Think of yourself as dead. you have lived your life. Now, take what's left, and live it properly.
h:
“Think of yourself as dead. you have lived your life. Now, take what's left, and live it properly.” —
Marcus Aurelius

q: It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket.
h:
“It's OK to have your eggs in one basket as long as you control what happens to that basket.” —
Elon Musk

q: Even if you stumble and fall down, it doesn't mean you've chosen the wrong path.
h:
“Even if you stumble and fall down, it doesn't mean you've chosen the wrong path.” —
Zen Proverb

q: All power is from within and therefore under our control.
h:
“All power is from within and therefore under our control.” —
Robert Collier

q: It is better to learn late than never.
h:
“It is better to learn late than never.” —
Publilius Syrus

q: You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept.
h:
“You may forget with whom you laughed, but you will never forget with whom you wept. ” —
Kahlil Gibran

q: No matter how much preparation we do, in the real tests of our lives, we'll be in unfamiliar terrain.
h:
“No matter how much preparation we do, in the real tests of our lives, we'll be in unfamiliar terrain.” —
Josh Waitzkin

q: Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm
h:
“Success is going from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm” —
Winston Churchill

q: The degree of responsibility you take for your life determines how much change you can create in it.
h:
“The degree of responsibility you take for your life determines how much change you can create in it.” —
Celestine Chua

q: Being spiritual has nothing to do with what you believe and everything to do with your state of consciousness.
h:
“Being spiritual has nothing to do with what you believe and everything to do with your state of consciousness.” —
Eckhart Tolle

q: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
h:
“The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph. ” —
George Washington

q: Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.
h:
“Nothing ever goes away until it has taught us what we need to know.” —
Pema Chodron

q: It takes a very long time to become young.
h:
“It takes a very long time to become young.” —
Pablo Picasso

q: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
h:
“When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson

q: No matter what happens, always be yourself.
h:
“No matter what happens, always be yourself.” —
Dale Carnegie

q: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
h:
“When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.” —
Bhagavad Gita

q: Those who look for the bad in people will surely find it.
h:
“Those who look for the bad in people will surely find it.” —
Abraham Lincoln

q: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
h:
“The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.” —
Brian Tracy

q: You can avoid reality, but you cannot avoid the consequences of avoiding reality.
h:
“You can avoid reality, but you cannot avoid the consequences of avoiding reality.” —
Ayn Rand

q: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
h:
“The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.” —
Elbert Hubbard

q: The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing.
h:
“The only real mistake is the one from which we learn nothing. ” —
Henry Ford

q: Truth is such a rare thing, it is delighted to tell it.
h:
“Truth is such a rare thing, it is delighted to tell it.” —
Emily Dickinson

q: Projecting your mind into a successful situation is the most powerful means to achieve goals.
h:
“Projecting your mind into a successful situation is the most powerful means to achieve goals. ” —
Estee Lauder

q: Everybody's life is either rewarding or an example.
h:
“Everybody's life is either rewarding or an example.” —
Tony Robbins

q: A hut full of laughter is richer than a palace full of sadness.
h:
“A hut full of laughter is richer than a palace full of sadness.” —
Zen Proverb

q: Presents are made for the pleasure of who gives them, not the merits of who receives them.
h:
“Presents are made for the pleasure of who gives them, not the merits of who receives them.” —
Carlos Ruiz Zafon

q: Where the willingness is great, the difficulties cannot be great.
h:
“Where the willingness is great, the difficulties cannot be great.” —
Niccolo Machiavelli

q: Being in a good frame of mind helps keep one in the picture of health.
h:
“Being in a good frame of mind helps keep one in the picture of health.” —
Unknown

q: Winning isn't always championships.
h:
“Winning isn't always championships.” —
Michael Jordan

q: The world doesn't owe you anything. It was here first.
h:
“The world doesn't owe you anything. It was here first.” —
Mark Twain

q: Creative endeavors are by their nature uncertain.
h:
“Creative endeavors are by their nature uncertain.” —
Robert Greene

q: We are most nearly ourselves when we achieve the seriousness of the child at play.
h:
“We are most nearly ourselves when we achieve the seriousness of the child at play.” —
Heraclitus

q: Life is ten percent what you experience and ninety percent how you respond to it.
h:
“Life is ten percent what you experience and ninety percent how you respond to it.” —
Unknown

q: Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with it.
h:
“Peace is not the absence of conflict, but the ability to cope with it.” —
Unknown

q: Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.
h:
“Be brave to stand for what you believe in even if you stand alone.” —
Roy T. Bennett

q: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
h:
“Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.” —
Mark Twain

q: The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.
h:
“The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.” —
Steve Maraboli

q: True it is, we only hate those whom we do not know.
h:
“True it is, we only hate those whom we do not know.” —
Andrew Carnegie

q: Each of us is a unique strand in the intricate web of life and here to make a contribution.
h:
“Each of us is a unique strand in the intricate web of life and here to make a contribution.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
h:
“Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.” —
Colin Powell

q: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.
h:
“The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts; therefore guard accordingly.
h:
“The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts; therefore guard accordingly.” —
Marcus Aurelius
